snippet: The move was seen by some analysts as retaliation for American legislation punishing Russian officials linked to human rights violations.
abstract: Russian health regulators announce formidable new barriers to import of meat from United States, move some analysts see as retaliation for American legislation punishing Russian officials linked to human rights violations.
lead_paragraph: The move was seen by some analysts as retaliation for American legislation punishing Russian officials linked to human rights violations.

headline.main: Russia Announces Barriers on Imports of U.S. Meat
headline.print_headline: Russia Announces Barriers on Imports of U.S. Meat

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
